scenario_text.value: Hello, my boy. Do you have a moment?
There is something in the water over there...
Oh? But I don’t see anything.

Truly? Hrrm... Perhaps humans cannot perceive
it? I sense some significance from it...

(Humans can’t see it... Oh, I know. I’ll try
<color=#B41919>looking with my camera</color>.)

It may be of some relation to Shuuji. Perhaps
you could evaluate its worth for yourself?
